name: Dracula: A Gothic RPG
description:
Inspired by 90s JRPG classics.

Collect souls for more powers, learn alchemy, and use your dark magic in battle.

Story:

After thousands of years, Dracula has been summoned for a mysterious purpose by ghosts and dark magicians. After he has awakened, he meets a quirky and comical cast of characters that will get him in a lot of trouble......but to be fair he's the Prince of Darkness, it's bound to happen.

Features:

👻 Party members include ghosts, zombies, and all types of Halloween friendlies.
🦠 Collect Souls to increase your power, or talk to the dead to learn their skills.
🎁 Collect items to decorate Dracula's Mansion.
⚔️ Explore and adventure the world with some ... rather unusual quests... as a dark hero.

Explore areas in classic JRPG style

~Victorian Forest~
